p
Class MovingObject

java.lang.Object
  p.MovingObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
Boat, Bubble, Fish
 class MovingObject
extends java.lang.Object

Represents an object which is positioned in plane and can move in both x and y direction.
Position is determined by x and y coordiantes.
The coordinates and the components of velocity are in double precision.
The position is visible in int precision, in all cases it is enough, and where we use the position outside of the class needed as int too!

Author:
Andras Belicza

makeStep

public void makeStep()
Makes this moving object to step one. Stepping means increasing position with the velocity.
